function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on subjective questionnaires for health assessments in buildings","Impact":"Inaccurate health assessments, potential for unreported health issues, and biased results","Mitigation":"Implement a combination of subjective and objective health assessment methods, provide training for accurate self-reporting, and ensure privacy and confidentiality of health data","Technologies":"Health monitoring devices, data analytics tools for health assessments","People":"Occupants of buildings, building professionals, researchers","Owner":"Building owners, researchers, health professionals"},{"Description":"Limited use of physiological/psychometric measurements for occupant health assessments","Impact":"Missed opportunities to capture accurate health data, limited understanding of occupant health and comfort, and potential neglect of important health indicators","Mitigation":"Invest in cost-effective measurement tools, provide training on data collection and analysis, and encourage the use of both subjective and objective health assessment methods","Technologies":"Biometric sensors, psychometric measurement tools, data analysis software","People":"Occupants of buildings, building professionals, researchers","Owner":"Building owners, researchers, health professionals"},{"Description":"Limited use of objective health measures in research studies","Impact":"Lack of accurate and comprehensive health data, potential oversight of critical health indicators, and reliance on potentially biased self-reported health information","Mitigation":"Facilitate access to objective health data, address privacy concerns, and promote the integration of objective health measures in research studies","Technologies":"Health monitoring devices, medical testing equipment, secure data storage and analysis tools","People":"Occupants of buildings, building professionals, researchers","Owner":"Building owners, researchers, health professionals"}]}
